Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Best Western Hotel Olimpia in Venice (Santa Croce), you'll be minutes from Tolentini and Piazzale Roma. This family-friendly hotel is close to Rialto Bridge and St. Mark's Basilica.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tolentini - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Piazzale Roma - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Papadopoli Gardens - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Scuola Grande di San Giovanni Evangelista - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Campo Santa Margherita - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Church of St. Roch - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Zenobio Palace - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Confraternity of St. Roch - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Scalzi Bridge - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Church of San Sebastiano - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. Mary of the Friars - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Frari Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Ca' Foscari University of Venice - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Palazzo Foscari - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Ca' Rezzonico - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Hotel Olimpia is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
